scripts.dev: concurrently "theme watch" "parcel watch scripts/index.js --out-dir assets --out-file bundle.js" "parcel watch styles/index.scss --out-dir assets --out-file style.css"
scripts.build: parcel build scripts/index.js --out-dir assets --out-file bundle.js && parcel build styles/index.scss --out-dir assets --out-file style.css
